content.text: I'm from New York City, I live in a nice area with my son. I'm a YouTuber who creates content for my audience. I believe in a progressive tax system. I love eating at the local sports bar with my son after his games.
I'm the youngest of five, and I love writing fiction for fun. I'm not comfortable sharing my ethnic background, but I will say that I love mashed potatoes. Last season, I was just getting started.
What do you like to write about?
I like to write about anything that interests me. I've written about my life, my family, and my friends. I've also written about current events and social issues.
That's great! What's your favorite thing about writing?
I love the ability to create my own worlds and characters. I also love the ability to share my stories with others.
That's awesome! I love that about YouTube too. I get to share my videos with people all over the world.
That's a great way to connect with people. I've met some really cool people through YouTube.
Me too! I'm glad we had a chance to chat. I really enjoyed talking to you.
Me too! I'm glad we met.
